## Result interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Result<T, E = T> extends Functor<T>, Applicative<T>, Monad<T>, Foldable<T>, Iterable<T>, Equatable, Hashable, Serializable<Result.JSON<T, E>>
```
